backend/main.mo: Backend actor managing jobs, user profiles, saved jobs, and admin‑gated job creation with allowlisted companies, keywords, and locations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and tests with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme color variables and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint with enhanced pre‑React loading fallback UI and error message container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, tab navigation, filters, layout components, and profile‑setup modal.
frontend/src/components/alerts/EmailAler: Provides UI to enable email alerts, enter an email, preview a generated job summary email, and copy or open it via mailto.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity and handles authentication state and errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal for initial user profile setup and submits name/email to the backend.
frontend/src/components/filters/Location: Offers a list of selectable job locations using checkboxes and tracks selected locations.
frontend/src/components/filters/TitleKey: Toggles a keyword-based job title filter and shows an accordion listing all keywords.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobCard.tsx: Displays individual job details with apply, source, save, and metadata sections.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobList.tsx: Fetches and renders a list of jobs with loading, error, empty, and count states.
frontend/src/components/jobs/SaveJobButt: Allows authenticated users to save or unsave a job and shows appropriate tooltips.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the top header with search, navigation tabs, logo, login button, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/FilterSid: Provides mobile and desktop filter panels with controls for title keywords and location filters.
frontend/src/components/saved/SavedJobsP: Displays saved jobs, showing login prompt if unauthenticated and listing saved job IDs when available.
frontend/src/components/summary/DailySum: Fetches filtered jobs and shows those posted in the last 24 hours with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and shows a recovery UI with reload and retry options.
Defines an allowlist of companies and a helper to check if a company is permitted.
frontend/src/constants/locations.ts: Lists allowed job locations for filtering.
frontend/src/constants/titleKeywords.ts: Defines title keywords and provides a function to check if a job title contains any of them.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a debounced state value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching jobs, saved jobs, user profiles, and applying job filtering logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/emailDraft.ts: Generates a daily job summary email with formatted job details.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats nanosecond timestamps into human-readable relative dates with fallback handling.
frontend/src/lib/jobSource.ts: Maps JobSource enum values to readable job source labels.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Checks whether a job's nanosecond timestamp is within the last 24 hours.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, issues, and features related to redeployment and loading fallback improvements.
